import default_image from "../../assents/images/default.svg" import star from "../../assents/icons/star.svg" import chair_director from "../../assents/icons/chair-director-icon.svg" import calendar from "../../assents/icons/calendar-icon.svg" import "./Movies.css" export default function Movies({films}) { return (

Movies

{films.map( movie =>
{movie.name}

{movie.opening_crawl}

{movie.director}

{movie.release_date}

)}
); };
